lines.text: If we weren't idiots, we wouldn't be soldiers.
Peace is nothing but a result of war.
Botched your mission? You couldn't destroy the base and you didn't kill Doctor J and the others.
How 'bout a little sympathy? In any case I'm still glad I decided to come here. I've got good news, your Gundam and mine are being rebuilt as we speak, ya know. I can hardly wait until they're done.
Looks like Oz will be keeping up alive for a while. It's a good chance so don't die yet.
Don't worry about me pal, I have no intention of dying that easily. There's the colonies to fight for. Just watch me, I'll become the God of Death once again... but right now, I need some sleep.

[Heero is walking, stops beside Relena]
I'll kill you...
[continues walking]

[Heero starts to lose control in Wing Zero]
Who... Who are... My Enemies...? My enemies are the ones after my life... My enemies are the ones that are after my life and the ones that toy with my life... They're all my enemies.
Stay calm if you want to live a little longer.
We don't stand a chance unless something pretty drastic happens.
I'm doing everything I can just in case that something drastic does happen.
Life is cheap, especially mine.
Duo, Duo Maxwell. I may run and hide, but I'll never tell a lie. Yeah, that's me in a nut shell.
In a case like this, anyway you look at it, you're the bad guy. You're not hurt, are you, miss?
For a quiet boy, you put on quite a show.
You'd better come up with a better way to kill yourself than that.
Anyone who sees me has a date with his maker.
Maaan, I'm going to have nightmares over this one.
I'm not asking you to trust me or anything, but right now, I'm the only friend you've got.

[after watching Heero set his own leg]
Ugh, I can't take much more of this.
Hey, wave back to them or something, they're cheering for us, Superstar!
Well she's not your average chick, wanting to see the guy who's trying to kill her.
But Mommy told me real men never scream out loud.
Damn! What a dinky way to kill us all off.
D'oh! This is such a lame way to die! This is so not cool!
There is nothing more valuable than life in this universe. Sandrock has taught me that.
That's funny. It seems I have tears in my eyes... but I'm not one bit sad.
They're violent and dangerous, but they're all really nice guys.
Put your hands down. I was the first one to surrender and came out, remember?
Nataku, guide me down the right path.
I don't kill women and children.
Who the hell are you?
I am Wufei. I won't run and hide until there's no-one left to fight.
Destroy the enemy and there won't be any problem.
I've got no right piloting the Nataku.
Death is a gift given at birth.
The god of death shall rise again but for now. I need some sleep...
The ones who are right have to be strong.
So you're the one who brainwashed my Trowa with your strange ideas. I won't let you off so easy next time.
That girl's tears stopped me. If you were in my shoes, you still would have done it, right? Now you should understand why I admire your strength.
I said this before. The only way to live a good life is to act on your emotions.

[after Heero says he has no intention of talking with an enemy, Quatre begins to lock onto Heero's suit while Quatre is in Wing Zero]
Well, I guess that's it, then. Goodbye, Heero.
I think they like you better.
I kill crazy people.
In that case I've got one warning. It hurts like hell.
Mission accomplished.
Do as you like, it's your country.
I'm not a pacifist.
Of course I can. I am a Gundam pilot, after all.
I don't believe in God.
I'm not involved.
I will survive!
I'll destroy you.
There's nothing wrong with acting on your emotions. At least, that's what I was told.
Assumptions lead to mistakes.
Hey, Wufei, I'm lonely. Keep me company till the end.
I am the God of death!
But, I'm a boy.
Thanks for those missiles earlier, buddy. Now I'll return the favor.
I have no name, but if you must call me something, it's Trowa, Trowa Barton.
I know all about danger. I'm used to waking on a tight rope.
Those who have laid eyes on a Gundam shall not live to tell about it.
One should never give up till the end.
So I will do what you have done. I'll simply follow my emotions.
Yeah, it'll be my last grand stand show.
So he wants to fight us again, does he? Sounds like this Zechs fellow is one hell of an admirable guy.
Then I guess you'd better hurry up and figure out this guy.
You're too weak.
I will correct the mistakes brought on by your weakness.
Damn it! Why is it that I have to keep fighting like this?
The name is Trowa, Lieutenant.
That was pretty fast... surprise, surprise.
Catherine! Stay away from here! I'm going to self-detonate along with him!
Hey, hey! Don't over do it or I'll have to blow you up Heero.
Are you satisfied?
Now I see, Heero's the soul of outer-space.
Cut it out, you guys!
Trowa! Outer space has gone crazy!
I will determine justice!
I am such a coward.
Woman! Are you listening? Woman!
I do not intend to fight. Now hurry up and retreat.
You saw I was a boy, and you underestimated me.
They're just so defenseless. Looks like they're not taking me seriously enough.
Zechs Marquise is dead.
Heero Yuy]
He's antisocial and thinks he is Evel Knievel.
Heero]
I don't know why I bother with this guy, he's anti social, thinks he's Evil Knievel and hardly ever talks.
[to Treize Khushrenada]
This friendship of the past will only last until my mask breaks.
Outer space has lost all reason. That's why I'm gonna destroy everything.
The five of us have become nothing more than redundant soldiers, Quatre. So now, let's accept it. Turn back into the nice guy I once knew.
Earth and space... the two exist together and form a pattern of confrontation. My name is Milliardo Peacecraft, I declare that we will eliminate the Earth the force that conflicts with space

In a move to counter the Alliance's tyranny, rebel citizens of certain colonies scheme to bring new arsenals to the Earth, disguising them as shooting stars. However, the Alliance Headquarters catches on to this operation.
[Heero is working on a computer sitting atop his Gundam]
repairs are possible.
[Duo approaches from offscreen]
Hey, you! I'm callin' you!
[Heero looks at Duo, then turns back to the computer screen]
You won't even acknowledge our help. Here I am, Mr. Niceguy, offerin' to fix your mobile suit with mine, but you just brush me right off.

[continues typing]
I don't want anybody touching my mobile suit. That's all, pal.
you haven't even got the parts.
[Duo vaults onto the torso of the Gundam with a grunt and sits on the edge]
Even the best engineers in the world couldn't repair machines without the parts... Mechanics need parts for repairs, not like you with your leg. You see what I'm sayin'?
[silence]
[Continues working, apparently ignoring Duo]

[sighs heavily Starts muttering to himself and gets progressively louder]
Why did I even bother rescuing this guy in the first place? He's antisocial, thinks he's Eval Knieval, and hardly speaks!
[groans]
You've got such a gloomy personality, why don't you just give up and stop *pretending* to be human?

[Ttrns to Duo]
Hey!
What is it? You're too late if you think you're gonna ask for my help.
Could you keep it down over there?
Yeah... Sure, forgive me for interrupting.
[a notice alarm goes off in the cockpit of the Gundam. Heero drops in and pulls up a console while Duo leans inside]
What is it?
an enemy carrier is transporting gundanium alloy. I'll see to it first thing in the morning.
*Hey!* You can't go anywhere with your machine in this shape! We're talkin' miracles, here!
It's take a miracle for you, but I can handle it.

[stands up and begins walking away]
Well, *excuse me* for being a *mere mortal*.
Wait, don't fire!
What? Why?
'Cause she's a woman!
